titleStmt.title: By the Queene the Queenes Maiestie being geuen to vnderstand, that chiefly through the disorderly traffiquing of such her marchauntes as trade into France for wines ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London by New-gate Market next vnto Christes Churche, by Richarde Iugge ...,

notesStmt.note: Second pt. of title from first three lines of text.
"Geuen at Kyllyngworth the xv day of July 1575 the xvii yeere of her Maiesties raigne."
